DOC.brief_title: Effect Physical Exercise Program During Pregnancy Excessive Weight Gain Its Consequences
DOC.detailed_description: BACKROUND : Pregnancy delivery condition significantly woman 's health . In particular , excessive gain weight pregnancy constitutes risk factor may lead ( ) different alteration pregnancy gestational diabetes hypertension , ( ii ) foetus health problem ( macrosomia ) , ( iii ) delivery complication ( dystocia , prolong labour increase number caesarean ) ( iv ) future health disorder woman ( overweight , obesity cardiovascular alteration ) . Furthermore , pregnancy pelvic floor health problem , urinary incontinence ( IU ) may arise worsen . OBJECTIVES : The main aim study ass effectiveness moderate physical exercise program call Blooming Exercise Program ( BEP ) develop pregnancy order control excessive maternal weight gain consequence . Additionally , objective study analyse influence BEP urinary incontinence , pregnancy outcome ( maternal foetal ) perception pregnant 's health . DESIGN : A randomized , control trial call conduct . 300 healthy pregnant woman recruit divided intervention group ( IG , n=100 ) control group ( CG , n=200 ) . The IG participate BEP week 10-12 gestation ( least 56 session 22 week . 3 session per week ) . The CG participate supervise program address pregnant woman receive regular health care . Pregnancy outcomes regard mother new bear , urinary incontinence woman 's habit data obtain registered initial interview , medical record two specific questionnaire health urinary incontinency ( ICIQ-SF King 's ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman Delivering `` Hospital Universitario de Fuenlabrada '' At week 1014 gestation Able attend 3 session per week end pregnancy Contraindications appoint ACOG Less 56 session
